name: FetchMarketplaceInstalledAddOnExtension
description: Fetch an instance of an Extension for the Installed Add-on.

InstalledAddOnSid.description: The SID of the InstalledAddOn resource with the extension to fetch.

Sid.description: The SID of the InstalledAddOn Extension resource to fetch.

$ul: **enabled**: Whether the Extension will be invoked.
**friendly_name**: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.
**installed_add_on_sid**: The SID of the InstalledAddOn resource to which this extension applies.
**product_name**: The name of the Product this Extension is used within.
**sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the InstalledAddOn Extension resource.
**unique_name**: An application-defined string that uniquely identifies the resource.
**url**: The absolute URL of the resource.
